channel.title: How To Change Server Ip [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey everyone. I used to code servers a little bit, but now i need help, as i have recently came back.
I just downloaded a source + a client, but how do i change the ip's on the client and source to 127.0.0.1?
Thanks.

item.title: How To Change Server Ip [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

i love you i vain i your so awsome and i totaly agree with you delta ftw!!

Read full topic

item.title: How To Change Server Ip [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]^ No ^

Delta is decent. PI is pure crap.[/quote]
By what I see 50% of the server download page is Pi’s thats what I mean. It’s like Pi has taken over. Im not saying that Delta is Pi. They differ Greatly.

Read full topic

item.title: How To Change Server Ip [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

[quote=“djdoyle1, post:4, topic:386908”][quote author=OmgItsShane link=topic=482678.msg3536097#msg3536097 date=1300572595]
Project Insanity.

Source: Go to Server.Java Search up server.equals change the ip. Search up Server keep going til you get to a ip then change. DONT KEEP GOING.

Client: Go to Client.Java Search up ip change it to yours. COMPILE SERVER AND CLIENT!

Delta.

Go to Client. Java Search up ip and change to urs.

Go to Gui.Java search ip change it to urs.

Congrats on Your server.
[/quote]
People still use PI? Wow, oh well. It’s the way the cookie crumbles.[/quote]
Umm Pi is the new Delta. Ha

Read full topic
